bibl.title: The Real Name of Dionysios Petosarapis.
Elkab and Beyond. Studies in Honour of Luc Limme
bibl.author: CLARYSSE, Willy

bibl.note: Studies the name of the rebel mentioned by DIODORUS XXXI, 15a. - The name Petosorapis. - The variant Peteusorapis. - The exceptional form Petosarapis. - The Fayum form Petsoraipis. - The exceptional forms Petesarapis and Petesorapis. - Uncertain passages. - Conclusion. "The real name of the famous rebel was no doubt Petosorapis and not Petosarapis."
CLARYSSE Willy, The Real Name of Dionysios Petosarapis.

Wouter CLAES, Herman DE MEULENAERE and Stan HENDRICKX (Edd.), Elkab and Beyond. Studies in Honour of Luc Limme = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 191 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2009) pp. 213-222, 1 tabl., 9 figg.
